content: Epic's registration process asks developers to select from a set of Epic-specific categories/permissions, and then gives patients a chance to review these (and de-select some if desired) at the time of app approval. Have you reviewed the user facing language they use to explain this? I have an Campo at the 12m30s mark of https://youtu.be/SzsyHy9qFok that provides some context
Jens Villadsen has marked this topic as resolved.
